sentences: The Secretariat introduced documents relating to the Adaptation Fund (FCCC/SBI/2006/MISC.5, MISC.7 & Add.1) and Chair Becker reported on the workshop in Edmonton (FCCC/SBI/2006/10).
BARBADOS and TUVALU called for special consideration of SIDS in the management of the Fund.
The EU, COLOMBIA and SWITZERLAND supported the GEF as the operating entity of the Fund.
With support from many developing countries, COLOMBIA added that the Fund should be managed independently and have flexible operational policies.
INDONESIA said technical assistance should be eligible for funding.
Levaggi and Sach will co-chair a contact group.
enb_long_title: Twenty-Fourth sessions of the Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI) of the UNFCCC and First session of the Ad Hoc Working Group on Further Commitments for Annex I Parties under the Kyoto Protocol (AWG) and related meetings
